description: Let (p1,p2), (p3,p4) be pairs of twin primes with p1*p2=p3+p4-1; sequence gives values of p1.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) list(lim)=my(v=List(),p=3,r); forprime(q=5,lim+2, if(q-p==2 && isprime(r=p*q\2) && isprime(r+2), listput(v,p)); p=q); Vec(v) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 29 2015(PARI) is(n)=isprime(n) && isprime(n+2) && isprime(n*(n+2)\2) && isprime(n*(n+2)\2+2) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 29 2015
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_
